Sentencas: The performance of planar solid oxide fuel cells (P-SOFCs) depends on factors such as material properties, cell geometry, and operating conditions.
Titulo: Correlating variability of modeling parameters with cell performance: Monte Carlo simulation of a quasi-3D planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: This paper assesses the sensitivity of cell performance to individual and simultaneous effects of these factors.
Titulo: Correlating variability of modeling parameters with cell performance: Monte Carlo simulation of a quasi-3D planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The analysis is based on Monte Carlo simulation (MCS) of a quasi-3D asymptotic spatially-smoothed (ASS) model, which can be applied to other types of fuel cells.
Titulo: Correlating variability of modeling parameters with cell performance: Monte Carlo simulation of a quasi-3D planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The ASS model describes the leading-order physics in the PEN (positive electrode-electrolyte-negative electrode) structure and interconnects (including plain channels surrounded by solid ribs) of a 3D P-SOFC, and allows fast computation within half an hour for MCS with large sample sizes in orders of 10(3).
Titulo: Correlating variability of modeling parameters with cell performance: Monte Carlo simulation of a quasi-3D planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: 26 modeling parameters are varied in two scenarios to investigate the individual and simultaneous effects of the varying parameters on cell performance, respectively.
Titulo: Correlating variability of modeling parameters with cell performance: Monte Carlo simulation of a quasi-3D planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The strength of the correlation between variations of parameters and cell performance are quantified and ranked, which provides information for cell optimization.
Titulo: Correlating variability of modeling parameters with cell performance: Monte Carlo simulation of a quasi-3D planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Different ranks are obtained for the two scenarios and also for cases with different cell voltages or nominal operating temperatures.
Titulo: Correlating variability of modeling parameters with cell performance: Monte Carlo simulation of a quasi-3D planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Extending the MCS of an ASS model for stack modeling is recommended.
Titulo: Correlating variability of modeling parameters with cell performance: Monte Carlo simulation of a quasi-3D planar solid oxide fuel cell
